name: flight-comparison
description: Flight comparison platform with frontend and backend

scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && npm test" "cd frontend && npm test"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd backend && npm run lint" "cd frontend && npm run lint"

author: Ankit Rathore
